content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Resource Manager!\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Beyond salary, psychological and social fulfillment can determine which employees are motivated to stay, perform, and contribute to organization success. Companies that nail employee engagement understand that motivating high performance and aligning talent with business strategy requires getting to the heart of what matters to employees.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why Does It Matter? \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The satisfaction and engagement of our employees should be one of our primary concerns as a leader. When employees are engaged in their work, it can directly impact the bottom line. Thousands of organizations around the world invest into employee engagement programs every year. Top-performing organizations know that employee engagement drives business outcomes. Business leaders have long recognized that attracting and retaining top talent is critical for organizational success. A highly-engaged workplace adapts quicker, grows faster and innovates more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is Employee Engagement?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is a huge number of approaches, definitions and models of engagement. For example,\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Towers Watson - \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"one of the leading providers within employee engagement domain, defines employee engagement as conditions, where employees know what their business is trying to achieve, understand their role in that effort and feel motivated to play a part in the company's success. Another world-class provider, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gallup group, \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"defines employee engagement as the employees' level of involvement with, enthusiasm for, and commitment to their work and the organization's outcomes. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tim Rutledge, \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Getting Engaged: The New Workplace Loyalty \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"author , explains that truly engaged employees are attracted to, and inspired by, their work (“I want to do this”), committed (“I am dedicated to the success of what I am doing”), and fascinated (“I love what I am doing”). Engaged employees care about the future of the company and are willing to invest the discretionary effort – exceeding duty's call – to see that the organization succeeds.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How does it work?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Companies across the globe are taking the initiative to administer and manage engagement surveys — that's the easy part. Implementing the action planning process and maintaining levels of engagement is the real challenge. The focus in organizations today must now be on action: how to drive better employee engagement. Once an organization believes that a more engaged workforce is better for customer loyalty, revenues and profits, the next logical step is in measuring current engagement to set a benchmark, and then regularly (at least annually) re-measuring engagement to chart progress.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More about EPAM Global Employee Engagement Survey:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/34a88172-8713-4b8c-99fd-369db0a0034c/5.jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Video is available \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?resolution=1920x1080&video=KR7960a4\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and more information at the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRES/EPAM+GLOBAL+EMPLOYEE+ENGAGEMENT+SURVEY+PROGRAM\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB space\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
